entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:58 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
